PROVENANCE: This list is based upon the Khan Charlson list, checked by Drs Rupert Payne, Duncan Edwards and Martin Roland - note only contains things related to stomach/duodenal ulcers. “itis”, symptoms such as dyspepsia and oesophageal symptoms are discounted.
CITATIONS: Khan NF, Perera R, Harper S, Rose PW. Adaptation and validation of the Charlson Index for Read/OXMIS coded databases. BMC Fam Pract 2010;11:1.
